title: daNDAyudan tarum
sahitya:
daNDAyudan tarum tighaTTA darishanam kaNDOrukkellAm uNDAkkum paravasham


anupallavi

  ten pazhani tannilE punnakaip-polivAlE anbarin innalai aDiyODu tuDaikkum


caraNam    parppala vEDam pUNDu pArttOrai Irttu arputak-kATSi pala aLikkum aNNalin
porppadam adu paTrip-pOTrip-paNivOrkku karpakat-taru pOlE narppadam IndiDum
